name: account
description:
As a customer,
I want to be able to use an account
in order to manage my user data

steps.name: I am on the registration page
no user account with my email exists
I create a new account with my data
output: - set company: Pulsiva GmbH Test - eBusiness
department is not available in ch
taxid is not available in ch
taxvat is not available in ch

steps.name: I should be on my account page
I already created an user account
I login with valid informations
I should be on my account page
I am logged in
output: I already created an user account
I should be on my account page

steps.name: I modify my paymentinfo
output: --> clicked button for change of payment
